languages.text: "Этот выродок стал вашим имуществом, когда вы взяли его в свиту. Я не стану нападать на вашего ксенопитомца, но ничто не мешает мне наблюдать и молиться, чтобы другие, менее скованные обязательствами слуги Его, преуспели".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Ваш ксеносский зоопарк меня не интересует, Вольный Торговец. Я здесь, чтобы пресечь преступление — и пока ни один человек не пострадал".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "This foul creature became your property when you took him into your retinue. I will not attack your pet xenos, but there is nothing to stop me from watching and praying that others less constrained by the obligations of His servants succeed in the attempt."
languages.original_text: "Этот выродок стал вашим имуществом, когда вы взяли его в свиту. Я не стану нападать на вашего ксенопитомца, но ничто не мешает мне наблюдать и молиться, чтобы другие, менее скованные обязательствами слуги Его, преуспели".

traits.locale_text: "This foul creature became your property when you took him into your retinue. I will not attack your pet xenos, but there is nothing to stop me from watching and praying that others less constrained by the obligations of His servants succeed in the attempt."

"This foul creature became your property when you took him into your retinue. I will not attack your pet xenos, but there is nothing to stop me from watching and praying that others less constrained by the obligations of His servants succeed in the attempt."

"This foul creature became your property when you took him into your retinue. I will not attack your pet xenos, but there is nothing to stop me from watching and praying that others less constrained by the obligations of His servants succeed in the attempt."

languages.text: "Diese schändliche Kreatur wurde Euer Eigentum, als Ihr ihn in Euer Gefolge aufgenommen habt. Ich werde Eure Xenos nicht angreifen, aber ich werde beobachten und beten, dass andere, die weniger an die Pflichten Seiner Diener gebunden sind, einen erfolgreichen Versuch unternehmen."
languages.original_text: "This foul creature became your property when you took him into your retinue. I will not attack your pet xenos, but there is nothing to stop me from watching and praying that others less constrained by the obligations of His servants succeed in the attempt."

traits.locale_text: "Diese schändliche Kreatur wurde Euer Eigentum, als Ihr ihn in Euer Gefolge aufgenommen habt. Ich werde Eure Xenos nicht angreifen, aber ich werde beobachten und beten, dass andere, die weniger an die Pflichten Seiner Diener gebunden sind, einen erfolgreichen Versuch unternehmen."

languages.text: « Cette ignoble créature est devenue votre propriété lorsque vous l'avez accueillie dans votre entourage. Je n'attaquerai pas votre xénos apprivoisé, mais rien ne m'empêche de le surveiller en priant pour qu'une autre personne, moins attachée à ses obligations envers l'Empereur, réussisse à l'abattre. »
languages.original_text: "This foul creature became your property when you took him into your retinue. I will not attack your pet xenos, but there is nothing to stop me from watching and praying that others less constrained by the obligations of His servants succeed in the attempt."

traits.locale_text: « Cette ignoble créature est devenue votre propriété lorsque vous l'avez accueillie dans votre entourage. Je n'attaquerai pas votre xénos apprivoisé, mais rien ne m'empêche de le surveiller en priant pour qu'une autre personne, moins attachée à ses obligations envers l'Empereur, réussisse à l'abattre. »

languages.text: “当你把这只邪恶的生物纳入随行人员的时候起，他就成为了你的财产。我不会攻击你的宠物异形，但我会始终盯着他的一举一动，顺便祈祷那些不受相关责任约束的人能顺利取走他的性命。”
languages.original_text: "This foul creature became your property when you took him into your retinue. I will not attack your pet xenos, but there is nothing to stop me from watching and praying that others less constrained by the obligations of His servants succeed in the attempt."

traits.locale_text: “当你把这只邪恶的生物纳入随行人员的时候起，他就成为了你的财产。我不会攻击你的宠物异形，但我会始终盯着他的一举一动，顺便祈祷那些不受相关责任约束的人能顺利取走他的性命。”

languages.text: «Esta horrenda criatura pasó a ser propiedad suya en cuanto la aceptó en su séquito. No atacaré a su xenos mascota, pero nada me impedirá observar y rezar por el momento en el que otros menos ligados a las obligaciones de Sus sirvientes tengan éxito en su intento».
languages.original_text: "This foul creature became your property when you took him into your retinue. I will not attack your pet xenos, but there is nothing to stop me from watching and praying that others less constrained by the obligations of His servants succeed in the attempt."

traits.locale_text: «Esta horrenda criatura pasó a ser propiedad suya en cuanto la aceptó en su séquito. No atacaré a su xenos mascota, pero nada me impedirá observar y rezar por el momento en el que otros menos ligados a las obligaciones de Sus sirvientes tengan éxito en su intento».

languages.text: 「この忌まわしい生き物は、あなたが自分の従者に迎え入れたときからあなたの所有物となりました。私はあなたのペットになった異種族は攻撃しませんが、私は躊躇せず見守り、そして陛下のしもべたちの義務にあまり縛られていない者たちが試みに成功するように祈ります」
languages.original_text: "This foul creature became your property when you took him into your retinue. I will not attack your pet xenos, but there is nothing to stop me from watching and praying that others less constrained by the obligations of His servants succeed in the attempt."

traits.locale_text: 「この忌まわしい生き物は、あなたが自分の従者に迎え入れたときからあなたの所有物となりました。私はあなたのペットになった異種族は攻撃しませんが、私は躊躇せず見守り、そして陛下のしもべたちの義務にあまり縛られていない者たちが試みに成功するように祈ります」

languages.text: "Bu pis yaratık, onu maiyetine aldığınızda malınız oldu. Evcil zenonuza saldırmayacağım. Tabii bir başkası bunu yapacak olsa O'nun hizmetkârlarının yükümlülükleriyle kısıtlanmadan bu girişiminde başarılı olması için dua edip bunu izlemekten hiçbir şeyi beni alıkoyamaz."
languages.original_text: "This foul creature became your property when you took him into your retinue. I will not attack your pet xenos, but there is nothing to stop me from watching and praying that others less constrained by the obligations of His servants succeed in the attempt."

traits.locale_text: "Bu pis yaratık, onu maiyetine aldığınızda malınız oldu. Evcil zenonuza saldırmayacağım. Tabii bir başkası bunu yapacak olsa O'nun hizmetkârlarının yükümlülükleriyle kısıtlanmadan bu girişiminde başarılı olması için dua edip bunu izlemekten hiçbir şeyi beni alıkoyamaz."
